post.body: Thank you so much! You don't know what much that means to me and @riddlespider too! Now I'm really off to bed. Night!
TY for that last comment. The whole world LOL Actually your right Haters love me. They spend so much time obesesing over me :)
You're the great mom. You're their teacher! Discipline and all that stuff. Mine run wild LOL
No I never feel like a great mom. I have no idea what I'm doing. the videos show how we play which is the easy part.
see @genuine's posts he had gone through what's happening to you.
Very hard. My heart aches all the time.
"Don't be mean to my sister!" - Bella. Then they cry and I cry and then the world starts to crumble, tornadoes fly by ...
Mmmm, no birds here. They've all flown South for the winter or the Tequila :)
am I subbed?
I wanted to use "f" but hubby wanted "ph" He won.
Oops. I just got into a tweet with a bunch of very smart people and um, I have not idea what I was trying to say :)
And then off to bed. Night!
Watching CNN and what's going on in Gaza
Dreaming I had some of @M_Somerville cupcakes, with blue icing perhaps?
My time-turner's a dud.
Oh silly me. I forgot. I have a time-turner! Back in a jiffy ;)
Watching Elizabeth. So which one is she? The current Queen's great Grandma or Great Great Great? They live so long I can never tell.
Can't wait for this documentary "The Missing Piece ... Theft of the Mona Lisa" http://tinyurl.com/888g8w
RT: @nicholaspatten Andy Warhol Still-Life Polaroids - until January 10, 2009 http://twurl.nl/3cbtom (I'm just not a big Warhol fan)
Gill Bellows who is yelling at Bauer right now was the nicest guy at the TIFF. He kept coming out to say hi to us star-gazers :)
